main event: A civilian observed a large green ball that appeared to explode and then disappeared downward, coinciding with a loud explosion, on January 27, 1961.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 seconds.,The object was observed visually from the ground.,Witness reported a loud explosion at the same time the object was seen.,Conclusions suggest the object may have been a meteorite due to its rapid ascent and subsequent disappearance.,It was observed 10 miles southwest of Russell, Kansas.
